EmailTemplate.description: use this template to create free form emails to customers / dealers
EmailTemplate.name: Free Form Email
EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Alert: {!Case.Subject} - Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting Sunpower. (Insert your message here).
Please feel free to reply to this email if you still need help or require more information, otherwise we will close the case ({!Case.CaseNumber}) in 5 business days
You may also contact us via https://us.sunpower.com and click on the “How can we help?” button at the bottom of your browser to launch a chat window. Alternatively you can call us at 1-800-786-7693. We’re here for you Monday through Friday from 7 a.m. until 7 p.m PST.
Thank you for giving us the opportunity to assist you.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName} | Customer Service Representative Global Business and Finance Services | office 1-800-786-7693 (SUNPOWER)
